alert.note: Alert for Giles; Lawrence; Lewis; Marshall; Maury (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 12:58PM CDT until July 01 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lewis County in Middle Tennessee... West central Marshall County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Lawrence County in Middle Tennessee... Southern Maury County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Giles County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Summertown, or 13 miles north of Lawrenceburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lawrenceburg, Mount Pleasant, Summertown, Ethridge, Lynnville, Gordonsburg, Henryville, Culleoka and Hampshire. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 32 and 43. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
